column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday May 7 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Cir area:
column4: Beaumont Centre Cir reportedly shutdown between the YMCA and Lakecrest Cir due to a ruptured gas line.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Cir area:
column4: No access to Beaumont Centre Pkwy toward Harrodsburg, and no access from Harrodsburg Rd to Beaumont Centre Pkwy.
